UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Thrombocidin-1-derived antimicrobial peptide TC19 combats superficial multi-drug resistant bacterial wound infections.
Literature.Author: Riool M, de Breij A, Kwakman PHS, Schonkeren-Ravensbergen E, de Boer L, Cordfunke RA, Malanovic N, Drijfhout JW, Nibbering PH, Zaat SAJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ESBL (LC=3.75µM),Escherichia coli ESBL (LC=>=60µM),Staphylococcus aureus JAR060131(LC=7.5-15µM),Staphylococcus aureus JAR060131(LC=>60µM)
